channel.title: Projects on Maël Valais
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Maël Valais

item.title: TouIST
item.description: Touist (see on github) is a Java and Ocaml project to provide a nice IDE as well as a high-level language for expressing and solving problems in propositional logic. This project was initiated during a school project in 2015 with three other school mates.

item.title: Logistique de crise et aide humanitaire (fr)
item.description: “Logistique de crise et aide humanitaire” is a research project completed during the M2 (2014-2015). github, report (fr), slides (fr)
